Setting Up Geovisualization
===========================

This section's purpose is to teach you both the ins and outs of the program and how to
set it up properly for personal or systematic use.

Download Asyncing Ship Geovisualization:
****************************************

1. Download ASG for **MAC** or **PC** from: http://www.ASG.org/download.html

.. admonition:: Reminder!

   If you have already downloaded the program you can skip this step.
